text: Esther Cornelia Brand (n√©e van Heerden; 29 September 1922 - 20 June 2015) was a South African athlete. She was born in Springbok, Northern Cape. She competed in the high jump and won the gold medal for South Africa at the 1952 Summer Olympics held in Helsinki, Finland. Brand died after a fall at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Olympic medalists for South Africa Category:Medalists at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists Category:South African athletes Category:High jumpers Category:Northern Cape
title: Esther Brand
